availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County.

Spouse: Mary Elizabeth Divine
Children: James W. Divine

bibl.p: U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Records, 1863-1865, Kentucky 7th District, Volume 1, page 10.
U.S. Find A Grave Index, 1600-Present, “Charles Elias Divine” http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=27569748&ref=acom accessed 05/16/2017.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Precinct 8, page 2.
